QuestData.Title: Fury of the Frostborn King
QuestData.Description: <As you retrieve the core from the chest, you hear the thumping of heavy footsteps rushing towards you from the corridor. There is the faint sound of battle in the distance.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Norgannon's Core back to Creteus in the Foot Steppes.
QuestData.CompletionText: Someone is using the Forge of Wills to create this army... Ulduar is no longer safe. $R, did you recover the core?
QuestData.RewardText: Someone is using the Forge of Wills to create this army... Ulduar is no longer safe.$B$B$R, I am pleased that you were able to reach the core before these abominations were.
